markdown:devnotes/sprint-2-backlog.md:27.title: Create a `RevealAnimation` component at `src/components/RevealAnimation.tsx`. It receives the full result payload (ConvergeResult type from `src/lib/engine/types.ts`). It should animate through each elimination round sequentially: show a bar chart of current tallies, highlight the eliminated option, animate vote transfers to remaining options, then advance to the next round. Use CSS transitions/animations (Tailwind + inline styles). End by highlighting the winner. Include a "Skip" button that jumps to the final state.
